parameters.name: ClientId
parameters.description: The ID of the Cloud Backup client. If you delete a backup snapshot for Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances, you must specify one of the ClientId and **InstanceId** parameters.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ECS instance. If you delete a backup snapshot for ECS instances, you must specify one of the InstanceId and **ClientId** parameters.

parameters.name: SnapshotId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup snapshot.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the backup source. Valid values:

*   **ECS_FILE**: backup snapshots for ECS files
*   **OSS**: backup snapshots for Object Storage Service (OSS) buckets
*   **NAS**: backup snapshots for Apsara File Storage NAS (NAS) file systems

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: The token that you want to delete.

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup vault.
